entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 25 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 25 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
